program_shell module¶

This module acts as a shell interface for performing the experiments

program_shell.create_parser()¶

Creates the argument Parser

Returns

a parser properly configured

Return type

ArgumentParser

program_shell.main()¶

Executes the program

Returns

None

program_shell.unpack_variables(dataset: str, optimizer: str, checkpoint_key: str, s_interval: int, ckp_interval: int, seed: int, train_mode: str, dataset_path: str)¶

Helper function that is used as a proxy for easily unpacking variables from the corresponding parser

Parameters

  • dataset – a string representing the dataset that has been configured by the user

  • optimizer – a string representing the optimizer that has been configured by the user

  • checkpoint_key – a string representing a checkpoint. Must be None if no checkpoint has been configured

  • s_interval – the summary interval that has been configured by the user

  • ckp_interval – the checkpoint interval that has been configured by the user

  • seed – the seed for random numbers

  • train_mode – Indicates the training mode that is going to be used

  • dataset_path – the path to the root of the dataset

Returns

the values of the unpacked arguments in the same order
